nodes.text: it looked like a hard claim to justify
We are making serious progress in defeating these extremists  the interim prime minister said  and ensuring that democracy wins out in Iraq.
Plausibly the attempts to defeat the extremists are failing
If the contrary position is very well supported by evidence it is hard to justify the claim
on a day during which the latest attack in Iraq claimed the lives of more than 40 people most of them children
The deadly attack is a sign of the increasing violence and of the failure in defeating terrorists
